name: Sky's Endless
description:
Recommented play with Windows Version Gameplay Video Feature
  • Pixel art
  • Top-Down Shooter
  • Hard Resource Management
  • Turn-based
  • Grid-based
  • Hardcore
  • Have day and night
  • Tower-Defence(But No Tower)
  • Farming
  • Crafting
Goal

Survive as long as possible, kill the monster, plant the seeds, harvest them, and craft them.

How to play

At start, you have all types of seed, you'd better plant iron and powder first, make sure you can survive the first day, make a pistol and some bullets.

Next step, you need additional place to plant, you'll need plough, but to make them, you need lots of seeds and wheats, so plant what is lacking of.

Blindage can defence the enemy's attack, but not too much.

Grenade excels in damaging a group of enemies or damaging enemy at close.

You can press "?" to check up how to control.

Craft System

Pistol - 4 Irons

Bullet x4 - 1 Iron, 1 Powder

Blindage - 8 Irons

Bread - 4 Wheats

Plough - 2 Wheat seeds, 2 Iron seeds, 2 Powder seeds, 4 Wheats

Grenade - 1 Iron, 4 Powders

ScreenShot Staff

All by Feishiko

Made with GameMaker Studio 2

Have fun^^
